channel.title: About Minecraft Server
channel.description: OK Guys I have Minecraft 1.1.0 and I was thinking can you make server to connect to LAN and Hamachi.I mean you have two IP addresses to connect to server?If it's possible can you tell me a link to the tutorial,if not oh well it won't harm me :D[shadow=red,left][/shadow]

item.title: About Minecraft Server

item.description:
@S_T_E_E_L1 wrote:

OK Guys I have Minecraft 1.1.0 and I was thinking can you make server to connect to LAN and Hamachi.I mean you have two IP addresses to connect to server?If it’s possible can you tell me a link to the tutorial,if not oh well it won’t harm me :D[shadow=red,left][/shadow]
